item.title: CUBE Player
item.description: Summary If you are using a phone, tablet, PC or Mac for your music playback, then you face many hidden costs and business risk. Hidden costs range from extra bandwidth to faster replacements of your tablet, to additional IT expenses. If you add up all those hidden costs, do you really arrive at a system that is actually cheaper than a CUBE player? We donâ€™t think so: simply consider what it would cost you to have to replace your tablet every 12 to 18 months.
